text: Robert James Waller (August 1, 1939 â€“ March 10, 2017) was an American author. He was best known for The Bridges of Madison County, a very successful book in 1993. He was also a photographer and musician. Waller died on March 10, 2017, at his home in Fredericksburg, Texas.
